enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before fetching objects to ensure the correct locale and context are set.
Adding paths to custom data files is necessary to ensure the fetchObject method has access to the required data.
The fetch method is closely related to fetchObject as it also retrieves data based on a key and context, making it useful for constructing assertions.
Both methods handle fetching data and manage null values, making safeFetch useful for asserting expected outcomes in test cases.
